io.micronaut.security.token.jwt.cookie

Class JwtCookieTokenReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.security.token.jwt.cookie.JwtCookieTokenReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.micronaut.core.order.Ordered, TokenReader

    @Requires(condition=CookieBasedAuthenticationModeCondition.class) @Requires(property="micronaut.security.token.jwt.cookie.enabled",notEquals="false",defaultValue="true")
 @Singleton
public class JwtCookieTokenReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements TokenReader
    Reads the token from the configured io.micronaut.security.token.jwt.cookie.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergio del Amo
